mapper.select: SELECT devices.id,devices.device_id,devices.model,devices.comments,devices.longitude,devices.latitude,devices.firstuptime,devices.updatetime, devices.state,devices.datastatus,devices.picture,devicetypes.id as typeid,devicetypes.name as typename,devicetypes.comments as typecomments, areas.id as areaid,areas.name as areaname,areas.size,areas.position,areas.parentarea_id FROM devices join devicetypes on devices.devicetype_id = devicetypes.id join areas on devices.area_id = areas.id

SELECT devices.id,devices.device_id,devices.model,devices.comments,devices.longitude,devices.latitude,devices.firstuptime,devices.updatetime, devices.state,devices.datastatus,devices.picture,devicetypes.id as typeid,devicetypes.name as typename,devicetypes.comments as typecomments, areas.id as areaid,areas.name as areaname,areas.size,areas.position,areas.parentarea_id FROM devices join devicetypes on devices.devicetype_id = devicetypes.id join areas on devices.area_id = areas.id WHERE devices.id = #{deviceId}

SELECT devices.id,devices.device_id,devices.model,devices.comments,devices.longitude,devices.latitude,devices.firstuptime,devices.updatetime, devices.state,devices.datastatus,devices.picture,devicetypes.id as typeid,devicetypes.name as typename,devicetypes.comments as typecomments, areas.id as areaid,areas.name as areaname,areas.size,areas.position,areas.parentarea_id FROM devices join devicetypes on devices.devicetype_id = devicetypes.id join areas on devices.area_id = areas.id WHERE devices.area_id in (${_parameter})
